summary: A woman inexplicably finds herself cut off from all human contact when an invisible, unyielding wall suddenly surrounds the countryside. Accompanied by her loyal dog Lynx, she becomes ... See full summary »
cast: Martina Gedeck|Luchs|Karlheinz Hackl|Ulrike Beimpold|Julia Gschnitzer|Hans-Michael Rehberg|Wolfgang M. Bauer
director: Director: Julian Pölsler (as Julian Roman Pölsler)
title: Die Wand
